details:
VSCode developers report:

> Visual Studio Code Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
>
> A remote code execution vulnerability exists in VS Code 1.82.0 and
> earlier versions that working in a maliciously crafted package.json
> can result in executing commands locally. This scenario would require
> the attacker to get the VS Code user to open the malicious project and
> have get the user to open and work with malformed entries in the
> dependencies sections of the package.json file.
>
> VS Code uses the locally installed npm command to fetch information on
> package dependencies. A package dependency can be named in such a way
> that the npm tool runs a script instead.
summary: vscode -- VS Code Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
